storyInfo: Zofia, taking Maria's feelings to heart, changes her mind. As the crowd watches, Maria looks like she's made a decision.

attributes.content: ...The match started already.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I've got to... mm?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Wait, why is my sword here?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Ah, Miss Maria brought it over earlier.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: She said she already gave it some adjustments, too. She guarantees it should be like new.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Byahâ€”!
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Mm... light and limber. I've missed this feeling.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: P-Please be careful! Oh, my, you've broken the balustrade again! We just had the stonesmith repair that in the Victorian style last year...
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Oh, you may as well just have someone renovate the whole place. In fact, you're in charge of that.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Really, another one of your whims?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: As long as someone can live in it...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Miss?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: ...Ah, no, I just... feel like I miss something, suddenly.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: This sword... Maria's grandfather gave it to me.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Miss Maria calls you an aunt, doesn't she?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: Family hierarchy is one unending wordy mess. I still remember how Margaret put itâ€”'This is your... your... you know what, she's your auntie.'
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I'm only about as old as them, aren't I? Reallyâ€”auntie?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You're very young. So young, and managing such a family enterprise. We take great pride in you, Miss Zofia.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: I snapped up all this land in one breath. Oh, back then, was I thinking I'd prove myself as well? Prove myself worthy of the 'Nearl' name, maybe? Worthy of the Radiant Knight...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: No... now's no time to pine for the past.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The car is all ready for you. Or do you think running there yourself might be faster?
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: I think that's obviousâ€”
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Just like a hunter toying with his prey, the Left-hand Knight keeps letting his foe gather herself and try again, and each time, he strikes Maria Nearl back down!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Marcin! We're back! How's it going?!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Why's Maria up against someone at that goddamned level? Has the Association gone mad?!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That'll be a long story... Are those kids safe?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: For the moment, can say that much. But they already got legal knighthood stripped right off them. Pfeh.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Never thought I'd see things get so goddarned out of hand...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Ashlock, Flametail, two other Infected knights without titles, and all the Infected they bought back from the arenas using everything they had...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Fighters! And the people toying with those Infected for funâ€”for god's sakes, they're all children! Their oldest was only twenty! Youngest was barelyâ€”!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Even if they hid themselves in the pipelines, just one full day in city bounds and their safety'd be out the window. Not to mention the crowd we have now.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: I got some old friends to look after them, but the Infected are Infected, still. Wish things'd be simple as that.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...We're not just picking a fight with the companies, now.
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Scared?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Scared?! Wasn't even scared when the Ursus were holding spears to my mouth! I'm a goddamned Ursus myself!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Fiddlesticks! When'd the Craftsmen ever get off those city walls?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Huh?! Instead of running up there, you think we should've just sat in the smithy and let the catapult smash all of us flat too?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Maria can't win this.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Aye. The Maria we know facing a foe like that, just ain't no way she'll win.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: No, not that there's no way. I mean she just can't.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Knights Association have played their hand too hard now. Add in that rotten Czarny popping up, and there's no way it can go ahead that simple.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Nnh...!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (My... my arm's about to dislocate... his spearâ€”I can't get close at allâ€”)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (â€”No, even if I did, there's still no way I'd win... what do I do...?)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Continue.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (Grit my teeth, and get up.) Nngh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: On the verge of toppling? You really are the image of your 'family knighthood,' struggling for breath.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Up. Continue. The best way to stamp out a knight is to stamp out her dignity.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: He taunts! He taunts, over and over! A look of disdain and victory in one, aimed square at his opponent! 'Left-hand' Tytus will make your blood run cold!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Now the prize pool's leaning completely one way, and the odds and figures are both out of control! Don't blink, but the money right now's gotta be on par with every other arena in Kazimierz combined!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Hey! Give it all you've got, Nearl! If you pull it outta the bag somehow, I'll win enough to buy a whole castle!
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Are you nuts? How much money did you put on her?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: â€”I put down even more on Left-hand! But I'm making nothing the way this is going, so I'm just hedging my bets a little!
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Hgghh... hah... hah...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: A visionary without a vision... wants to be a knight too.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I won't kill you. Forfeit. The times of old will not fade for having done so. Abandon this, and you abandon only yourself.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Are you... sympathizing with me?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: â€”Correct. As you do not deserve for me to treat you as a knight.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I've seen footage of your fights. From Szewczyk, through the race, the melee...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I went out of my way to observe 'the Nearl family's new knight,' and every lucky victory of yours was a personal affront to meâ€”look at you. You had the gall to waste my time like this?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Ughhâ€”!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Stand firm, Maria Nearl. I will tell you the worlds that separate you and the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Her shining light could drown her opponent's will. Her sheer passion made me tremble. Her sheer talent made others envy her.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: And youâ€”victory against you is trivial. I will extinguish your resolve, to a pile of ash.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Airtime! Tytus has once against sent Maria's weapon flying!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Oh, man, this loop of devastation is too much bear, but no problem! The arena isn't just to let flesh and blood flyâ€”it lets knights go on a rampage of pure strength!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Taunting! Pressuring! Destroying! This is 'Left-hand' Tytus, mercilessly disposing of the weak!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: (So forceful...! And my shield split apart?! This is the one Margaret left!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (Traces of Arts on the edge of his bladeâ€”his Artsâ€”)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight had not the Black Knight's strength, nor the Blood Knight's menace. She went against the lowest tier of the Major, and became champion by no more than a flukeâ€”
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: â€”Even if I console myself so, I still know deeply the chasm that separated us. Against her, I have only pity for you, seeing your weakness.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I might not... compare to my sister...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: But I am stillâ€”a Nearl family knight!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Eyesore.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (One flick of his handâ€”?!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Enough! Insult me no longer with the Arts you used on Ingra!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Ungh... ugh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Do not rise again. No matter your armor's resilience, your pain must be excruciating.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You silently raise your arm again. Your tenacity at least deserves recognition.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Sorry, sorryâ€”make way, make way!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I can finally see her...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: ...Maria.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: What now? You have not even the energy to speak?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Your breaths come wild, your stance is empty... what path to victory could you even speak of?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Whatâ€”mnph.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: The noble knight, the commercial leviathan, the veteran of the Major, Tytus Topola, once more narrows his eyesâ€”
â€”to the light that pierces them.
